subject: Skeleton (Sport)
Olympic Games (2006)
Baldness
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: The 30-year-old skeleton racer is on course for his first Olympics in Vancouver after a suspension tied to his use of an antibalding medication.
snippet: The 30-year-old skeleton racer is on course for his first Olympics in Vancouver after a suspension tied to his use of an antibalding medication.
